auth.title: Get started
auth.description: How would you like to authenticate for this project?
auth.terms: Terms of Services and Privacy Notice for Gemini CLI
auth.restarting: Logging in with Google... Restarting Gemini CLI to continue.

options.computeAdc: Use metadata server application default credentials

errors.authRequired: You must select an auth method to proceed. Press Ctrl+C twice to exit.

settings.title: Settings
settings.instructionsWithScope: (Use Enter to select, Tab to change focus)
settings.restartPrompt: To see changes, Gemini CLI must be restarted. Press r to exit and apply changes now.

stats.cacheSavings: {{tokens}} ({{percent}}) of input tokens were served from the cache, reducing costs.
stats.usageLimits:
Usage limits span all sessions and reset daily.
/auth to upgrade or switch to API key.
stats.statsTip: » Tip: For a full token breakdown, run `/stats model`.

folderTrust.title: Do you trust this folder?
folderTrust.description: Trusting a folder allows Gemini to execute commands it suggests. This is a security feature to prevent accidental execution in untrusted directories.
folderTrust.restarting: Gemini CLI is restarting to apply the trust changes...
folderTrust.exitMessage: A folder trust level must be selected to continue. Exiting since escape was pressed.

newAgents.title: New Agents Discovered
newAgents.description: The following agents were found in this project. Please review them:
newAgents.ignore: Do not enable (Ask again next time)

ideTrustChange.changedConnection: Workspace trust has changed due to a change in the IDE connection.
ideTrustChange.changedTrust: Workspace trust has changed due to a change in the IDE trust.
ideTrustChange.pressRestart: Press 'r' to restart Gemini to apply the changes.

validation.openUrl: Please open this URL in a browser: {{url}}
validation.failedOpenLink: Failed to open verification link. Please try again or change authentication.
validation.waiting: Waiting for verification... (Press ESC or CTRL+C to cancel)
validation.pressEnter: Press Enter when verification is complete.
validation.actionRequired: Further action is required to use this service.

ideIntegrationNudge.connectPrompt: Do you want to connect {{ideName}} to Gemini CLI?
ideIntegrationNudge.installTextPreInstalled: If you select Yes, the CLI will have access to your open files and display diffs directly in {{ideName}}.
ideIntegrationNudge.installTextNew: If you select Yes, we'll install an extension that allows the CLI to access your open files and display diffs directly in {{ideName}}.

rewindConfirmation.title: Confirm Rewind
rewindConfirmation.rewindAndRevert: Rewind conversation and revert code changes
rewindConfirmation.infoText: Rewinding does not affect files edited manually or by the shell tool.

model.title: Select Model
model.autoDescriptionDefault: Let Gemini CLI decide the best model for the task: gemini-2.5-pro, gemini-2.5-flash
model.autoDescriptionPreview: Let Gemini CLI decide the best model for the task: gemini-3-pro, gemini-3-flash
model.enablePreviewFeatures:
Enable "Preview features" in /settings.
Learn more at https://goo.gle/enable-preview-features
model.modelFlagUsage: > To use a specific Gemini model on startup, use the --model flag.

maxOutputTokens.label: Max Output Tokens
maxOutputTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate

multiFolderTrust.cancelled:
Operation cancelled. The following directories were not added:
- {{folders}}
multiFolderTrust.yesAndRemember: Yes, and remember the directories as trusted
multiFolderTrust.notTrusted:
The following directories were not added because they were not trusted:
- {{folders}}
multiFolderTrust.question: Do you trust the following folders being added to this workspace?
multiFolderTrust.description: Trusting a folder allows Gemini to read and perform auto-edits when in auto-approval mode. This is a security feature to prevent accidental execution in untrusted directories.

permissions.title: Modify Trust Level
permissions.inheritedFromParent: Note: This folder behaves as a trusted folder because one of the parent folders is trusted. It will remain trusted even if you set a different trust level here. To change this, you need to modify the trust setting in the parent folder.
permissions.inheritedFromIde: Note: This folder behaves as a trusted folder because the connected IDE workspace is trusted. It will remain trusted even if you set a different trust level here.
permissions.instructions: (Use Enter to select, Esc to close)
permissions.restartPrompt: To apply the trust changes, Gemini CLI must be restarted. Press 'r' to restart CLI now.

editor.title: Select Editor
editor.instructions: (Use Enter to select, Tab to change focus, Esc to close)
editor.description: These editors are currently supported. Please note that some editors cannot be used in sandbox mode.

errors.loadFullFailed: Failed to load full session content

rewindViewer.title: Rewind
rewindViewer.instructions: (Use Enter to select a message, Esc to close, Right/Left to expand/collapse)

instructions.full: (Use Enter to {{action}}, Tab to {{toggle}}, Esc to close)
